name: Message when Combo Appears
author: Kite
info:
This will check for the specified combo. If found, it will play a message. If the combo disappears, the check for the combo will reset. This only works on layer 0.

This was made in response to a request by Cukeman: https://www.purezc.co...showtopic=53855
